forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 9 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco with a gentle embrace of clouds, wrapping the city in a comfortable shroud. The temperature lingers around 57 degrees, while a soft west-southwest wind dances through the streets, creating a subtle symphony of rustling leaves and whispered conversations. While the skies may appear mostly darkened by cloud cover, there’s still a sense of warmth and tranquility that invites one to unwind after a bustling day.

As dawn breaks tomorrow, expect the sun to break through with the promise of a mostly sunny day. Temperatures will rise to a comfortable 67 degrees, tapering gently to around 65 in the afternoon, as the breeze picks up, dancing playfully around 9 to 17 mph, with the possibility of greater gusts. This brings a pleasant freshness, suggesting it’s an ideal day for outdoor pursuits—a walk along the Embarcadero, a quiet moment in a café, or perhaps visiting a nearby park. 

For those venturing outside, light layers will serve well, balancing the cool air of the morning with the warmth of the sun's embrace later in the day. Perhaps a light sweater to ward off the chill of the san Francisco fog, followed by a comfortable jacket for the ever-present breeze. This blend of conditions makes for a lovely day to explore the city’s hidden gems, stroll through neighborhoods, or simply savor the day at a leisurely pace.
